00038 using namespace ProbSpec;
00039 
00041 void BuildCSP(StateObj* stateObj, CSPInstance& instance)
00042 {
00043   // XXX : Hack for reify / reifyimply problem.
00044   getState(stateObj).setDynamicTriggersUsed(true);
00045 
00046   // Set up variables
00047   BuildCon::build_variables(stateObj, instance.vars);
00048 
00049   // Set up optimisation
00050   if(instance.is_optimisation_problem)
00051   {
00052     if(instance.optimise_minimising)
00053       Controller::optimise_minimise_var(stateObj, BuildCon::get_AnyVarRef_from_Var(stateObj, instance.optimise_variable));
00054     else
00055       Controller::optimise_maximise_var(stateObj, BuildCon::get_AnyVarRef_from_Var(stateObj, instance.optimise_variable));
00056   }
00057 
00058   vector<vector<AnyVarRef> >& print_matrix = getState(stateObj).getPrintMatrix();
00059 
00060   // Reserve room in vector - no necessary but more efficent.
00061   print_matrix.reserve(instance.print_matrix.size());
00062   for(unsigned i = 0; i < instance.print_matrix.size(); ++i)
00063       print_matrix.push_back(BuildCon::get_AnyVarRef_from_Var(stateObj, instance.print_matrix[i]));
00064 
00065   // Impose Constraints
00066   for(list<ConstraintBlob>::iterator it = instance.constraints.begin();
00067       it != instance.constraints.end(); ++it)
00068   {
00069      getState(stateObj).addConstraint(build_constraint(stateObj, *it));
00070   }
00071 
00072   // Solve!
00073   getState(stateObj).getOldTimer().maybePrintTimestepStore(Output_Always, "Setup Time: ", "SetupTime", getTableOut(), !getOptions(stateObj).silent);
00074   Controller::initalise_search(stateObj);
00075   getState(stateObj).getOldTimer().maybePrintTimestepStore(Output_Always, "Initial Propagate: ", "InitialPropagate", getTableOut(), !getOptions(stateObj).silent);
00076 
00077 }
00078 
00079 void SolveCSP(StateObj* stateObj, CSPInstance& instance, SearchMethod args)
00080 {
00081   vector<AnyVarRef> preprocess_vars = BuildCon::build_val_and_var_order(stateObj, instance.search_order[0]).first;
00082   function<void (void)> search(bind(Controller::deal_with_solution, stateObj));
00083 
00084   // Set up variable and value ordering
00085   for(int i = instance.search_order.size() - 1; i >= 0; --i)
00086   {
00087     SearchOrder order = instance.search_order[i];
00088 
00089     if(args.order != ORDER_NONE)
00090       order.order = args.order;
00091 
00092     pair<vector<AnyVarRef>, vector<int> > var_val_order = BuildCon::build_val_and_var_order(stateObj, instance.search_order[i]);
00093 
00094     if(getOptions(stateObj).randomise_valvarorder)
00095     {
00096       getOptions(stateObj).printLine("Using seed: " + to_string(args.random_seed));
00097       srand( args.random_seed );
00098 
00099       std::random_shuffle(var_val_order.first.begin(), var_val_order.first.end());
00100       for(unsigned i = 0; i < var_val_order.second.size(); ++i)
00101         var_val_order.second[i] = (rand() % 100) > 50;
00102     }
00103 
00104     switch(args.prop_method)
00105     {
00106       case PropLevel_GAC:
00107       search = solve(stateObj, search, order, var_val_order, instance, PropagateGAC());
00108       break;
00109       case PropLevel_SAC:
00110       search = solve(stateObj, search, order, var_val_order, instance, PropagateSAC());
00111       break;
00112       case PropLevel_SSAC:
00113       search = solve(stateObj, search, order, var_val_order, instance, PropagateSSAC());
00114       break;
00115       default:
00116       abort();
00117     }
00118   }
00119 
00120   getState(stateObj).getOldTimer().maybePrintTimestepStore(Output_2, "Build Search Ordering Time: ", "SearchOrderTime", getTableOut(), !getOptions(stateObj).silent);
00121 
00122   PropogateCSP(stateObj, args.preprocess, preprocess_vars, !getOptions(stateObj).silent);
00123   getState(stateObj).getOldTimer().maybePrintTimestepStore(Output_2, "Preprocess Time: ", "PreprocessTime", getTableOut(), !getOptions(stateObj).silent);
00124   getState(stateObj).getOldTimer().maybePrintTimestepStore(Output_1, "First node time: ", "FirstNodeTime", getTableOut(), !getOptions(stateObj).silent);
00125 
00126   if(!getState(stateObj).isFailed())
00127   {
00128     try
00129       { search(); }
00130     catch(EndOfSearch)
00131     { }
00132   }
00133 
00134   getState(stateObj).getOldTimer().maybePrintFinaltimestepStore("Solve Time: ", "SolveTime", getTableOut(), !getOptions(stateObj).silent);
00135   getOptions(stateObj).printLine("Total Nodes: " + to_string( getState(stateObj).getNodeCount() ));
00136   getOptions(stateObj).printLine(string("Problem solvable?: ") + (getState(stateObj).getSolutionCount() == 0 ? "no" : "yes"));
00137 
00138   if(getOptions(stateObj).cspcomp)
00139   {
00140     if(getState(stateObj).getSolutionCount() != 0)
00141       cout << "s SATISFIABLE" << endl;
00142     else
00143       cout << "s UNSATISFIABLE" << endl;
00144   }
00145 
00146   getOptions(stateObj).printLine("Solutions Found: " + to_string(getState(stateObj).getSolutionCount()));
00147 
00148   getTableOut().set("Nodes", to_string(getState(stateObj).getNodeCount()));
00149   getTableOut().set("Satisfiable", (getState(stateObj).getSolutionCount()==0 ? 0 : 1));
00150   getTableOut().set("SolutionsFound", getState(stateObj).getSolutionCount());
00151 
00152   if(getOptions(stateObj).tableout)
00153   {
00154     getTableOut().print_line();  // Outputs a line to the table file.
00155   }
00156 
00157 #ifdef MORE_SEARCH_INFO
00158   if(!getOptions(stateObj).silent)
00159     print_search_info();
00160 #endif
00161 
00162 }
